metadata.name: Bucket::Acl
metadata.description:
Bucket Access Control List

Represents a Bucket’s Access Control List.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.readers.each { |reader| puts reader }

metadata.name: Acl::reload!
metadata.description: Reloads all Access Control List data for the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.reload!

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.owners.each { |owner| puts owner }

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.writers.each { |writer| puts writer }

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.readers.each { |reader| puts reader }

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.acl.add_owner "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "authors@example.net"
bucket.acl.add_owner "group-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.acl.add_writer "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "authors@example.net"
bucket.acl.add_writer "group-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.acl.add_reader "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "authors@example.net"
bucket.acl.add_reader "group-#{email}"

metadata.name: Acl::delete
metadata.description: Permanently deletes the entity from the bucket’s access control list.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.acl.delete "user-#{email}"

metadata.name: Acl::auth!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the authenticatedRead predefined ACL rule to the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.auth!

metadata.name: Acl::private!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the private predefined ACL rule to the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.private!

metadata.name: Acl::project_private!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the projectPrivate predefined ACL rule to the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.project_private!

metadata.name: Acl::public!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the publicRead predefined ACL rule to the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.public!

metadata.name: Acl::public_write!
metadata.description: Convenience method to apply the publicReadWrite predefined ACL rule to the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.public_write!
